title: Chinese Beef and Potato Stew
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '325g diced stewing beef steak', '1 tablespoon shaoxing wine', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon finely chopped ginger', '1 tablespoon finely chopped spring onion', 'water, as needed', '475g potatoes, peeled and cut into bite-sized chunks']
